law.catch_line: Paroled prisoner under supervision of department -- Cessation.
law.text: Paroled prisoners shall be under the supervision of the department and subject to its direction for the duration of parole. Supervision of the parolee by the department shall cease at the time of recommitment of the prisoner to prison as a parole violator, or at the time a final discharge from parole is granted to the parolee by the board.
law.history: Amended 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 211, sec. 109, effective July 14, 1992 -- Amended 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 344, sec. 46, effective July 15, 1982. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 74, Art. V, sec. 24(16). -- Created 1962 Ky. Acts ch. 82, sec. 4.
